content: no need to put your knitting down when having coffee strolling or simply chatting at home with friends while knitting this hat the conversationalist is the perfect companion for those social knitting times when you need a simple knit and don t want to lose your place you ll still end up with an adorable wearable hat samples from left to right bohemian blue c1 / cc bloom c2 baroque c1 / powdered sugar c2 overcoat c1 / winter halo c2 jean valjean c1 / wax poetic c2
